H0.text: Humus is what the soil becomes when microorganisms deplete the oxygen in soil through respiration.

H1.text: Anaerobic is the state that soil becomes when microorganisms consume the oxygen through respiration.

H2.text: Compost is what the soil becomes when microorganisms deplete the oxygen in soil through respiration.

H3.text: Aerobic is what the soil becomes when microorganisms deplete the oxygen in soil through respiration.

A4.text: Due to the lack of oxygen, this pathway is described as anaerobic respiration.
